mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_variety_encyclopedia ( variety_id, variety_alias, property_flavor, product_time, distribution_area, effect ) VALUES (#{variety_id}, #{variety_alias}, #{property_flavor}, #{product_time}, #{distribution_area}, #{effect} )
mapper.update: UPDATE km_variety_encyclopedia SET record_status = 5 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, variety_id, synopsis, chinese_name, latin_name, alias, two_law, circles, door, outline, item, suborder, section, family, genus, speices, subspecies, distribution_area, graph_url, feature, habit, distrubtion_range, variety, cultivation_tech, main_value, composition FROM km_variety_encyclopedia WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT a.object_id, CONCAT_WS('',b.chinese_name,c.title,/*d.title,*/e.step_name,f.title,g.name) AS title, CONCAT_WS('',b.variety_id,e.sop_id,g.cat_code) AS variety_id, a.km_type, CASE WHEN a.km_type = 1 THEN '品种百科' WHEN a.km_type = 2 THEN '资讯类' /*WHEN a.km_type = 3 THEN '文章类'*/ WHEN a.km_type = 4 THEN '品种SOP' WHEN a.km_type = 5 THEN '培训' WHEN a.km_type = 6 THEN '品种药典' END AS type_name, date_format(a.publish_time,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS publish_time, a.`status`, /*CASE WHEN a.`status` = 0 THEN '未通过' WHEN a.`status` = 1 THEN '通过' ELSE*/ '待审核' /*END*/ AS status_name FROM km_audit a LEFT JOIN km_variety_encyclopedia b ON a.object_id = b.id AND a.km_type = 1 LEFT JOIN info_basic c ON a.object_id = c.id AND a.km_type = 2 /*LEFT JOIN spec_article d ON a.object_id = d.id AND a.km_type = 3*/ LEFT JOIN km_sop_step e ON a.object_id = e.id AND a.km_type = 4 LEFT JOIN train_video_course f ON a.object_id = f.id AND a.km_type = 5 LEFT JOIN km_pharmacopoeia_information g ON a.object_id = g.id AND a.km_type = 6 WHERE 1=1
and (b.chinese_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or c.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') /*or d.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')*/ OR e.step_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR f.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR g.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
AND a.km_type = #{type_code}
and a.`status` IS null OR a.`status`=2 ORDER BY a.`status` DESC
SELECT id,produce_area,GROUP_CONCAT(goods_name) AS goods_names from mall_supply GROUP BY produce_area
SELECT id,search_text,search_date FROM history_search_text ORDER BY search_date DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(",",variety_name,variety_alias)) AS care_names FROM common_user_care_varieties_r a LEFT JOIN common_medicine_variety b ON a.variety_code = b.variety_code WHERE 1=1 and a.user_id = #{user_id}
